TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PageRangeSelection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether all the pages or only a limited range will be processed by an operation, usually printing.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is primarily used as the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PageRangeSelection%2A> property of the [PrintDialog](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/printdialog.md).
## Examples The following example shows how to use the enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.PrintDialog.PageRangeSelection%2A> property by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code.
[!code-xaml[PrintDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)]
...
[!code-csharp[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection AllPages = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection CurrentPage = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection SelectedPages = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.PageRangeSelection UserPages = int32(1)
